title: What is your legal marital or same-sex civil partnership status?
info: Answer with regard to the your current legal marital status. If cohabiting, record the legal marital status at this question (e.g. ‘single, that is never married, ‘divorced’)

options.label: Never married and never registered in a same-sex civil partnership
Married

Widowed

Formerly in a same-sex civil partnership which is now legally dissolved
